          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature-time graph for water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur-Zeit Diagramm für Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique de Température-temps pour l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráfico do Temperatura-tempo para a água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grafico di Temperatura-tempo per acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμοκρασία-χρονική γραφική παράσταση για το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gráfico del Temperatura-tiempo para el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the changes in state of water from ice and beyond its boiling point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">three states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Änderungen im 
Zustand des Wassers vom Eis und über seinem Siedepunkt hinaus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre les changements de 
l'état de l'eau de la glace et au delà de son point d'ébullition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra as mudanças no estado 
da água do gelo e além de seu ponto fervendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra che i cambiamenti 
dentro dichiarano di acqua da ghiaccio ed oltre il relativo punto
di ebollizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τις 
αλλαγές στην κατάσταση του ύδατος από τον πάγο και πέρα από το 
σημείο βρασμού της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra los cambios en el 
estado del agua del hielo y más allá de su punta que hierve.</string>
          </description>
